Nice work, don't raise an Exception though. Big no, Exceptions deal with a lot more than standard errors, they include environment errors.
In your case, either raise a StandardError, ArgumentError or a NameError
cool, thanks for the tip, i'll use it next time.
Nice :D I got the same results also with Javascript. using FB API
we can also enhance it to count comments for each post, but it'll take lots of time to request these from FB API.
I even thought of making user authentication using device and check if the user is a member of the group to let him in :) this way we can also post to the group from our app/site.
yes a Read/Write/Comment App with hall of fame, hashtags and search, users can interact through app or through facebook. :D
Actually u know what hold it right here and jump to the chat :)
What are facebook rate limits like? and how do they compare to say twitter?
